data.title: Obituary for Gerald Green
data.meta_description: Gerald Green | June 17, 2024 & Warrenton, NC | When... Learn More
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Gerald Green | R. H. Greene Funeral Home
data.text:
When we all get to Heaven, what a day of rejoicing that will be. When we all see Jesus, we sing and shout the victory. With care and compassion, R. H. Greene Funeral Home is offering comfort to the family of Mr. Gerald Green, age 75 of Oakland, California, formerly of Warren County, North Carolina. Mr. Green transitioned on Monday, June 17, 2024 at his residence.

A Celebration of Life will be conducted on Tuesday, July 2, 2024 at 1:00 p.m. in the sanctuary of Chapel Hill Baptist Church in the Oine Community, Norlina, North Carolina. The Reverend Maggie H. Stinnett, Pastor will officiate and interment will follow in the church cemetery.

Everlasting memories will forever be cherished by: his beloved wife, Dr. Monica Scott Green of Lakewood Ranch, Florida; one son, Charles Clifford Green of Aurora, Colorado; one brother, Ernest David Green (Willa) of Upper Marlboro, Maryland; two sisters, LeAnn Holden-Martin of Bowie, Maryland and Dr. Crystal Green of Richmond, Virginia; one brother-in-law, James C. Scott of Oakland, California; one sister-in-law, Y. E. Scott of Aurora, Colorado; a host of nieces, nephews, cousins, relatives and friends.

Mr. Green will lie in repose on Tuesday, July 2, 2024 from 12:00 noon until the hour of service at Chapel Hill Baptist Church.

The family invites those who cannot attend to view the service on zoom at https://us02web.zoom.us/join and enter meeting ID: 842 9292 3642.

In lieu of flowers, the family request memorial donations be made to the www.Brotherhoodofelders.net. (The Brotherhood of Elders is an intergenerational network of men of African ancestry who foster environments where Black boys and young men are empowered to flourish.)

The family will meet at the home of Andre and Laura Britt, 131 Kerr Lake-Colebridge Road, Norlina, North Carolina.

Services entrusted to R. H. Greene Funeral Home.
